func.title: FindBase

param.name: player
param.desc: Player whose home base you are looking for.

param.name: index
param.desc: Search index for finding multiple home base objects. index = 0 finds the first base, and so on.

func.desc: Searches for the home base of a player. The home base is usually the building with the flag.

example.text: Gives the selected clonk the order to enter his home base.
